amendment.description: To provide additional weeks of temporary extended unemployment compensation for individuals who have exhausted such compensation and to make extended unemployment benefits under the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act temporarily available for employees with less than 10 years of service.

action.text: Amendment SA 1170 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1170 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 48. Record Vote Number: 269.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1170.

Amendment SA 1170 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9169-9171, S9178, S9180, S9181; text: CR S9170) To provide additional weeks of temporary extended unemployment compensation for individuals who have exhausted such compensation and to make extended unemployment benefits under the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act temporarily available for employees with less than 10 years of service.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1170 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 48. Record Vote Number: 269.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1170 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 1136.
